message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it.  I'm asking $110 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $85 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $95,  which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product. What do you think?
